description:
On a spring day when the cherry blossoms have started to fall, the naïve princess of a small country, Lion begins her days at a school in Hokkaido. The school houses a special facility run by ALCA that trains Logicalists who protect the peace of the world. Lion has a lot of unique classmates in Class 1-S, including Nina, a Logicalist. This is the story of the energetic and adorable days the Logicalists-in-training spend together. It’s time to Trance!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

node.description:
__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/itoken438)__

__Birthplace:__ Mie Prefecture, Japan

__Ken Itou__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/miho_karasawa)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/miho_karasawa/)__

Miho Karasawa is a Japanese singer who was previously signed to Horipro and is currently signed to Lantis.  Since 2014, she has performed under the stage name True (stylized as TRUE). 

She has performed theme songs for [Buddy Complex](https://anilist.co/anime/20533/), [Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet](https://anilist.co/anime/16524), [Maria the Virgin Witch](https://anilist.co/anime/20840) and [Sound! Euphonium](https://anilist.co/anime/20912/), among others. Karasawa made her debut in 2000 with the release of the song "Anytime, Anywhere".

__Place of Birth:__ Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan
__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=152) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/12maru17) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/maruasahina) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/madoka_maru_hina/)

Non-Anime Roles: 
- Ribbon (Tevi) (VG)
